text: A viper entered a blacksmith's workshop, begging for charity from the tools. After receiving something from all of them, and missing only the lime, he went to him and begged him to give him something. "You're well fooled", replied the lime, "if you think I'll give you anything! I'm the one who's not used to giving, but to taking something from everyone! You'll never get anything from someone who just takes others away.
title: La víbora y la lima
author: nan Esopo
